DataElement.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Patient Self-Report Last 7 Days Mouth Sensitivity at its Worst Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the severity of mouth sensitivity at it's worst in the last 7 days, using an 11 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Patient Self-Report Past Week Mouth Sensitivity at its Worst Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases.  Onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._Report coming directly from patients or subjects through interviews or self-completed questionnaires or other data capture tools such as diaries about their life, health condition(s) and treatment. NOTE: PROs are used to assess outcomes involving the patients'/subjects' perceptions, symptoms, satisfaction with treatment, adherence to prescribed regimens. PROs include outcomes recorded by interviewers transcribing the views expressed by the patient, but the term does not apply to outcomes recorded by observers who rely on their own judgment. A PRO is usually distinguished from a self-reported objective measurement such as a PEF score or body weight [from PRO Draft Guidance, Gordon Guyatt and Holger Schuneman - personal communication; Patrick, D.L., 2003. After Acquardo C., Berzon C., et al., 2001] See also outcome, subject, patient._The most recent week, including today._A question about an individual's mouth sensitivity at its worst._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A graft versus host disease with symptoms appearing more than 100 days post-transplant.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Property.preferredName: Patient Self-Report Past Week Mouth Sensitivity at its Worst Score

Concepts.definition: Subjective reports made by a patient.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about an individual's mouth sensitivity at its worst.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: MDASI Severity of Symptom Score 11 Point Likert Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard for the subjective scoring of symptoms that ranges from 0: Not Present to 10: As Bad as You Can Imagine.
